IF YOU WANT TO DOWNLOAD THE ENGLISH VERSION, FIRST DOWNLOAD THE CRACK FROM THIS TORRENT OR FROM EITHER OF THE FOLLOWING LINKS: (Remove the @ symbols)
http://www.media@@@@fire.com/?hvn0i76oyx4ffk

https://hot@@@@file.com/dl/154289805/ab52751/biltma_6sc.rar.html

THEN FOLLOW THESE INSTRUCTIONS:

Adobe CS6 Master Collection (English)
LS16 = en_US, en_GB, ja_JP ... and it's available now for download.

1. Register/Login to Adobe: https://www.adobe.com/cfusion/membership/index.cfm?
2. Open this page: http://www.adobe.com/cfusion/tdrc/index.cfm?product=master_collection (just to set cookie)
3. Copy desired link from below to address field, press Enter to download (don't use download managers)

Windows:
trials2.adobe.com/AdobeProducts/STAM/CS6/win32/MasterCollection_CS6_LS16.7z
trials2.adobe.com/AdobeProducts/STAM/CS6/win32/MasterCollection_CS6_LS16.exe
Mac:
trials2.adobe.com/AdobeProducts/STAM/CS6/osx10/MasterCollection_CS6_LS16.dmg

4. Disable internet, install using serial: 1325-0160-5283-9851-2671-8951 (choose to validate later)
5. Run some of apps in trial mode to enable features, then just Exit
6. Copy/replace patched amtlib.dll in app folders (Files are in the links at the beginning)

Enjoy fully working CS6 apps.


NOTES:
- Keep backups of original amtlib.dll files to restore them when keygen arrives 
- On Windows 8 use Windows 7 compatibility mode on installer + run as admin
-Hosts file patch does NOT work anymore, you will need to block adobe's IP address 192.150.16.211 via an Antivirus or similar program

No crack for Mac yet, sadly, but you can download the installer and run it in trial until the crack does come out :)

And some more info for installing the amtlib.dll:

Please, check it! Acrobat/Distiller and Flash Builder works only for 30 days if you don't replace the DLL. But if you replace the DLL, both Acrobat and Flash Builder Acrobat/Distiller and Flash Builder WILL NOT work. 

It looks like the provided DLL does not work for these programs but it works for the other ones. Try changing your computer date 6 months ahead, start the programs and then reboot, set the date back and start the programs again and you'll see it failing.

Look at your temp folder (%temp%) and read the amt3.log file and you'll see the reason of it failing.

Could someone crack the DLLs for both Acrobat/Distiller and Flash Builder?

Maybe other programs will need it also. I installed only the 32-bit apps.

And more info to above comment:
Acrobat/Distiller and Flash Builder will fail no matter if you install in 'Trial' mode or with the CS6 serial. In both cases it will fail after 30 days. It also doesn't matter if you replace your 'hosts'  files with uptodate info. It'll just fail. 

I tried to overcome it in several ways with no luck!

So I think it needs a special amtlib.dll
